channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report X-2024020298
item.description:
Report X-2024020298

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-12T18:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-10
  • City: GRAND RAPIDS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was leaking in Van. Was brought to VSA when discovered. Was placed in leaker tote to prevent further spillage. DescribePack: the top was loose. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Was placed in leaker tote

item.title: Report X-2024020119
item.description:
Report X-2024020119

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-12T18:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-29
  • City: LIVONIA
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE DUE TO THE RATTLE OF AEROSOLS CANS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED (2) 19 OUNCE AEROSOL CANS OF KABOOM WITH OXI CLEAN. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM MICHIGAN USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 4XW144, DURACO, 7400 INDUSTRIAL DR., FOREST PARK IL 60130-2536.

item.title: Report X-2024010779
item.description:
Report X-2024010779

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-07T15:11:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-05
  • City: PORTAGE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was located in the middle of the trailer on the floor leaking. QA took steps to remediate the spill ny putting the package in a hazmat leaker tote. The tote was moved to the HAZMAT cage for processing. DescribePack: Cap was leaking DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed package in leaker tote for later processing.
